headline: Kellanova Declares Regular Dividend of $0.58 per Share for Fourth Quarter
summary: Kellanova (NYSE: K) today announced that its Board of Directors declared a dividend of $0.58 per share on the common stock of Kellanova, payable on December 15, 2025, to shareowners of record at the close of business on December 1, 2025. The ex-dividend date is December 1, 2025. This is the 404th dividend that Kellanova has paid to owners of common stock since 1925.

headline: Kellanova Brands Unveil Fall and Halloween Limited-Edition Treats to Celebrate the Season
summary: Fall has arrived, and Kellanova brands are serving up a delicious lineup of seasonal snacks that are perfect for cozy nights, game day gatherings, and even a trip to the Upside Down. From pumpkin spice to magical movie moments, this year's limited-edition offerings are packed with festive flavors and fan-favorite collaborations. These treats won't stick around forever, so grab them before they ghost you.

headline: United States Oats Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025: A $2.92 Billion Market by 2033 Featuring General Mills, B&G Foods, Kellanova, Marico, PepsiCo, Nestle, Blue Lake Milling, Avena Foods
summary: The United States Oats Market is set to grow from US$ 1.88 billion in 2024 to US$ 2.92 billion by 2033, with a 5.03% CAGR from 2025-2033. This surge is fueled by rising plant-based diets, increased health awareness, and demand for convenient, nutritious meals. Oats, known for their heart-healthy benefits and sustainability, are increasingly used in cereals, snacks, and beverages. Key trends include plant-based adoption and convenience, but challenges such as climate sensitivity and trade issues
